routes.name: Get Groups Definition -> Get User Attributes
Wait For Indicators Reputation -> Set Source Data
Get SECURITY_INIT_ACCESS Data -> Security Initial Access
Set Source Data -> Alert Has Indicators
Update Alert State -> Wait For Indicators Reputation

workflows.name: G: Indicator (Type URL) > Set Reputation and Block

params.value:
{% if vars.foundAVReputation %}

AlienVault OTX Summary

Tags {{(vars.steps.Get_Reputation_from_AlienVault_OTX.data.results | json_query("[*].tags[]") | unique | string).replace("[","").replace("]","")}}

{% endif %}

{{vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_VT.data.aggregate}}
Detection Ratio: {{vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_VT.data.positives}}/{{vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_VT.data.total}}
VirusTotal

steps.name: Bock URL on FortiGate
steps.description: This step adds the URL to the static web filter on FortiGate

params.value:
{% if vars.foundURLvoidReputation %}

{%if 'detections' in vars.steps.Get_Reputation_from_URLVoid.data %} {{vars.steps.Get_Reputation_from_URLVoid.data.detections.count}}{%else%} 0 {%endif%}
IP Address: {{vars.steps.Get_Reputation_from_URLVoid.data.details.ip.addr}}
URLVoid

{% endif %}

arguments.operationTitle: Check Category of Domain or URL

{{vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_VT.data.aggregate}}
Detection Ratio: {{vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_VT.data.positives}}/{{vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_VT.data.total}}
VirusTotal

Anomali ThreatStream

{% endif %}

conditions.condition: {{ vars.vt_reputation >= vars.reputation_threshold or vars.phishtank_reputation >= vars.reputation_threshold or vars.alienvault_reputation >= vars.reputation_threshold or vars.fortiguard_reputation >= vars.reputation_threshold }}
{{ vars.vt_reputation == 0 and vars.phishtank_reputation == 0 and vars.alienvault_reputation == 0 and vars.fortiguard_reputation == 0 }}

message.content:
Get Indicator Reputation

- Fetched Indicator <{{vars.indicator_value}}> : - AlientVaultOTX: {{vars.alienvault_reputation}} - VirusTotal.com: {{vars.vt_reputation}} - FortiGuard: {{vars.fortiguard_reputation}}

resource.description:
{{vars.steps.Enrichment_Summary.data['formatted_string']}}
{% if "Malicious" in vars.result.Reputation_Type_Text %} Seems {{vars.result.Reputation_Type_Text}}
{% elif "Good" in vars.result.Reputation_Type_Text %} Seems {{vars.result.Reputation_Type_Text}}
{% elif "No Reputation Available" in vars.result.Reputation_Type_Text %} Seems {{vars.result.Reputation_Type_Text}}
{%endif%}

steps.name: Start
steps.description: Indicator reputation is set as 'TBD' by 'Create and Link Indicator' utility playbook. We can ignore those indicators when triggering this PB

routes.name: Get URL Reputation from VT -> Aggregate Results
Get Reputation from Phishtank -> Aggregate Results
Aggregate Results -> Compute AV OTX Summary
Get Reputation from URLVoid -> Aggregate Results
Get URL Reputation FortiGuard -> Aggregate Results
Set Malicious -> Quarantine IP on FortiGate
Configuration -> Get Reputation from AlienVault OTX
Configuration -> Get File Reputation from Anomali
Get URL Reputation from Anomali -> Aggregate Results
Compute AV OTX Summary -> Is Malicious
Get Reputation from AlienVault OTX -> Aggregate Results
